statements: DELETE FROM smart_locks_status WHERE user_id = 100 AND entry_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM smart_locks_status WHERE lock_id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM lock_access_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND access_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM smart_locks WHERE lock_id = 1 AND lock_status = 'active';
DELETE FROM lock_access_logs WHERE access_type = 'admin' AND access_time < '2022-09-01' AND lock_id = 2;
DELETE FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 100 AND lock_id = 200;
